gameDetails.description: Set of two bonus cards for Tesla vs. Edison, Ada Lovelace and Michael Faraday. These cards are used in Phase 1. Ada Lovelace has 2 Inventions, 1 Manufacturing, and 1 Propaganda. Michael Faraday has 3 Inventions and 1 Propaganda.
